amendment.description: To make oral and maxillofacial surgeons eligible for incentive special pay payable to medical officers of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1478 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1478 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12501) To make oral and maxillofacial surgeons eligible for incentive special pay payable to medical officers of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1478 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1478 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Hutchison.
